trans-unit.source: Use the knife bootstrap subcommand to run a bootstrap operation that installs the chef-client on the target system. The bootstrap operation must specify the IP address or FQDN of the target system.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife bootstrap 子命令来运行引导操作，该操作将Chef-Client安装在目标系统上。引导操作必须指定目标系统的IP地址或FQDN。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife configure subcommand to create the knife.rb and client.rb files so that they can be distributed to workstations and nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife configure 子命令来创建knife.rb和client.rb文件，以便可以将它们分发到工作站和节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife delete subcommand to delete an object from a Chef server. This subcommand works similar to knife cookbook delete, knife data bag delete, knife environment delete, knife node delete, and knife role delete, but with a single verb (and a single action).
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife delete 子命令从Chef服务器删除对象。此子命令的工作方式类似于 knife cookbook delete ， knife data bag delete ， knife environment delete ， knife node delete 和 knife role delete ，但具有单个动词（和单个动作）。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife deps subcommand to identify dependencies for a node, role, or cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife deps 子命令来标识节点，角色或食谱的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife diff subcommand to compare the differences between files and directories on the Chef server and in the chef-repo. For example, to compare files on the Chef server prior to an uploading or downloading files using the knife download and knife upload subcommands, or to ensure that certain files in multiple production environments are the same. This subcommand is similar to the git diff command that can be used to diff what is in the chef-repo with what is synced to a git repository.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife diff 子命令比较Chef服务器和Chef-repo中文件和目录之间的差异。例如，在使用 knife download 和 knife upload 子命令在上载或下载文件之前比较Chef服务器上的文件，或确保多个生产环境中的某些文件相同。此子命令类似于 git diff 命令，该命令可用于将Chef-repo中的内容与同步到git存储库的内容进行区别。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife download subcommand to download roles, cookbooks, environments, nodes, and data bags from the Chef server to the current working directory. It can be used to back up data on the Chef server, inspect the state of one or more files, or to extract out-of-process changes users may have made to files on the Chef server, such as if a user made a change that bypassed version source control. This subcommand is often used in conjunction with knife diff, which can be used to see exactly what changes will be downloaded, and then knife upload, which does the opposite of knife download.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife download 子命令将角色，菜谱，环境，节点和数据包从Chef服务器下载到当前工作目录。它可以用于备份Chef服务器上的数据，检查一个或多个文件的状态，或提取用户可能对Chef服务器上的文件进行的进程外更改，例如用户是否进行了更改绕过了版本源代码控制。此子命令通常与 knife diff 结合使用，后者可用于确切查看将要下载的更改，然后 knife upload ，这与 knife download 相反。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife edit subcommand to edit objects on the Chef server. This subcommand works similar to knife cookbook edit, knife data bag edit, knife environment edit, knife node edit, and knife role edit, but with a single verb (and a single action).
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife edit 子命令来编辑Chef服务器上的对象。此子命令的工作方式类似于 knife cookbook edit ， knife data bag edit ， knife environment edit ， knife node edit 和 knife role edit ，但具有单个动词（和单个动作）。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife list subcommand to view a list of objects on the Chef server. This subcommand works similar to knife cookbook list, knife data bag list, knife environment list, knife node list, and knife role list, but with a single verb (and a single action).
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife list 子命令查看Chef服务器上的对象列表。该子命令的工作方式类似于 knife cookbook list ， knife data bag list ， knife environment list ， knife node list 和 knife role list ，但具有单个动词（和单个动作）。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife raw subcommand to send a REST request to an endpoint in the Chef server API.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife raw 子命令将REST请求发送到Chef服务器API中的端点。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife recipe list subcommand to view all of the recipes that are on a Chef server. A regular expression can be used to limit the results to recipes that match a specific pattern. The regular expression must be within quotes and not be surrounded by forward slashes (/).
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife recipe list 子命令可以查看Chef服务器上的所有食谱。正则表达式可用于将结果限制为与特定模式匹配的配方。正则表达式必须在引号内，并且不能用正斜杠（/）引起来。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife search subcommand to run a search query for information that is indexed on a Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife search 子命令运行搜索查询，以搜索在Chef服务器上建立索引的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife serve subcommand to run a persistent chef-zero against the local chef-repo. (chef-zero is a lightweight Chef server that runs in-memory on the local machine.) This is the same as running the chef-client executable with the --local-mode option. The chef_repo_path is located automatically and the Chef server will bind to the first available port between 8889 and 9999. knife serve will print the URL for the local Chef server, so that it may be added to the knife.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife serve 子命令对本地chef-repo运行持久的零厨师。 （chef-zero是在本地计算机上以内存形式运行的轻量级Chef服务器。）这与运行带有 --local-mode 选项的Chef-client可执行文件相同。所述 chef_repo_path 被自动定位并且厨师服务器将结合到第一个可用的端口之间 8889 和 9999 。 knife serve 服务器将打印本地Chef服务器的URL，以便可以将其添加到knife.rb文件中。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife show subcommand to view the details of one (or more) objects on the Chef server. This subcommand works similar to knife cookbook show, knife data bag show, knife environment show, knife node show, and knife role show, but with a single verb (and a single action).
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife show 子命令查看Chef服务器上一个（或多个）对象的详细信息。该子命令的工作方式类似于 knife cookbook show ， knife data bag show ， knife environment show ， knife node show 和 knife role show ，但具有单个动词（和单个动作）。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife ssh subcommand to invoke SSH commands (in parallel) on a subset of nodes within an organization, based on the results of a search query made to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 根据对Chef服务器的搜索查询结果，使用 knife ssh 子命令在组织内节点子集上并行调用SSH命令。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife ssl check subcommand to verify the SSL configuration for the Chef server or a location specified by a URL or URI. Invalid certificates will not be used by OpenSSL.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife ssl check 子命令来验证Chef服务器的SSL配置或URL或URI指定的位置。OpenSSL将不使用无效的证书。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife ssl fetch subcommand to copy SSL certificates from an HTTPS server to the trusted_certs_dir directory that is used by knife and the chef-client to store trusted SSL certificates. When these certificates match the hostname of the remote server, running knife ssl fetch is the only step required to verify a remote server that is accessed by either knife or the chef-client.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife ssl fetch 子命令可将SSL证书从HTTPS服务器复制到利刀和Chef-client用来存储受信任SSL证书的 trusted_certs_dir 目录。当这些证书与远程服务器的主机名匹配时，运行 knife ssl fetch 是验证刀或厨师客户端访问的远程服务器所需的唯一步骤。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife ssl fetch subcommand to pull the SSL certificate down from the Chef server:
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife ssl fetch 子命令从Chef服务器中拉下SSL证书：

trans-unit.source: Use the knife status subcommand to display a brief summary of the nodes on a Chef server, including the time of the most recent successful chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife status 子命令显示Chef服务器上节点的简要摘要，包括最近一次成功运行Chef-client的时间。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife upload subcommand to upload data to the Chef server from the current working directory in the chef-repo. The following types of data may be uploaded with this subcommand:
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife upload 子命令将数据从chef-repo中的当前工作目录上传到Chef服务器。可以使用此子命令上载以下类型的数据：

trans-unit.source: Use the knife xargs subcommand to take patterns from standard input, download as JSON, run a command against the downloaded JSON, and then upload any changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife xargs 子命令从标准输入中提取模式，下载为JSON，针对下载的JSON运行命令，然后上传所有更改。

trans-unit.source: Use the list-client-keys subcommand to list client keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list-client-keys 子命令列出客户端密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the list-user-keys subcommand to list client keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list-user-keys 子命令列出客户端密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to list all of the environments that are currently available on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数列出Chef服务器上当前可用的所有环境。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to list all of the tags that have been applied to a node.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数列出已应用到节点的所有标签。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view a list of cookbooks that are currently available at https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks当前可用的食谱列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view a list of cookbooks that are currently available on the Chef server. The list will contain only the most recent version for each cookbook by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看Chef服务器上当前可用的食谱列表。默认情况下，列表仅包含每个食谱的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view a list of data bags that are currently available on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看Chef服务器上当前可用的数据包列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view a list of registered API client.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看已注册的API客户端的列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view a list of registered users.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看注册用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view a list of roles that are currently available on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看Chef服务器上当前可用的角色列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the list argument to view all of the nodes that exist on a Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 list 参数查看Chef服务器上存在的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the load_current_value method to guard against property values being replaced. For example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 load_current_value 方法来防止替换属性值。例如：

trans-unit.source: Use the load_current_value method to load the specified property values from the node, and then use those values when the resource is converged. This method may take a block argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用 load_current_value 方法从节点加载指定的属性值，然后在资源聚合时使用这些值。此方法可以采用block参数。

trans-unit.source: Use the lockfile setting in the client.rb file to specify non-default locations for the lock file. (The default location is typically platform-dependent and is recommended.)
trans-unit.target: 使用 lockfile 在client.rb文件设置到指定锁定文件的非默认位置。（默认位置通常取决于平台，建议使用。）

trans-unit.source: Use the metadata from file argument to load the metadata for a cookbook from a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 metadata from file 的元数据参数从文件中加载食谱的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the metadata argument to generate the metadata for one or more cookbooks.
trans-unit.target: 使用 metadata 参数为一本或多本食谱生成元数据。

trans-unit.target: 使用 on 方法将事件类型与回调关联。回调定义了事件在Chef-client运行期间发生时采取的步骤，并且使用任意Ruby代码定义。语法如下：

trans-unit.source: Use the on method to create an event handler that sends email when the chef-client run fails. This will require:
trans-unit.target: 使用 on 方法创建一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序在厨师客户端运行失败时发送电子邮件。这将需要：

trans-unit.source: Use the on method to specify the event type
trans-unit.target: 使用 on 方法指定事件类型

trans-unit.source: Use the org-create, org-delete, org-list, org-show, org-user-add and org-user-remove commands to manage organizations.
trans-unit.target: 使用 org-create ， org-delete ， org-list ， org-show ， org-user-add 和 org-user-remove 命令来管理组织。

trans-unit.source: Use the owner and right properties and avoid the group and mode properties whenever possible. The group and mode properties are not true Microsoft Windows concepts and are provided more for backward compatibility than for best practice.
trans-unit.target: 使用 owner 和 right 属性，并尽可能避免使用 group 和 mode 属性。该 group 和 mode 的属性是不正确的Microsoft Windows的概念和比对最佳实践的向后兼容性，提供更多。

trans-unit.source: Use the platform? method to ensure that certain actions are run for specific platform. The platform? method will return true if one of the listed parameters matches the node['platform'] attribute that is detected by Ohai during every chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 使用 platform? 确保针对特定平台运行某些操作的方法。该 platform? 如果列出的参数之一与Ohai在每次厨师客户端运行期间检测到的 node['platform'] 属性匹配，则该方法将返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Use the platform_family? method to ensure that certain actions are run for specific platform family. The platform_family? method will return true if one of the listed parameters matches the node['platform_family'] attribute that is detected by Ohai during every chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 使用 platform_family? 确保针对特定平台系列运行某些操作的方法。该 platform_family? 如果列出的参数之一与Ohai在每次厨师客户端运行期间检测到的 node['platform_family'] 属性匹配，则该方法将返回true 。

trans-unit.target: 使用 property_is_set? 检查属性值是否设置的方法。语法为：

trans-unit.source: Use the provider property within the resource block to specify the long name of the provider as a property of a resource. For example: provider Chef::Provider::Long::Name
trans-unit.target: 使用资源块中的 provider 属性将提供程序的长名称指定为资源的属性。例如： provider Chef::Provider::Long::Name

trans-unit.source: Use the provides method to associate a custom resource with the Recipe DSL on different operating systems. When multiple custom resources use the same DSL, specificity rules are applied to determine the priority, from highest to lowest:
trans-unit.target: 使用 provides 方法将自定义资源与不同操作系统上的Recipe DSL关联。当多个定制资源使用相同的DSL时，将应用特定性规则来确定优先级，从最高到最低：

trans-unit.source: Use the ps_credential helper to embed a PSCredential object—a set of security credentials, such as a user name or password—within a script, which allows that script to be run using security credentials.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ps_credential 帮助程序将 PSCredential 对象（一组安全凭证，例如用户名或密码）嵌入脚本中，该脚本允许使用安全凭证运行该脚本。

trans-unit.source: Use the raise keyword to stop a chef-client run by triggering an unhandled exception
trans-unit.target: 使用 raise 关键字通过触发未处理的异常来停止chef-client运行

trans-unit.source: Use the reboot_pending? method to test if a node needs a reboot, or is expected to reboot. reboot_pending? returns true when the node needs a reboot.
trans-unit.target: 使用 reboot_pending? 测试节点是否需要重新引导或预期重新引导的方法。 reboot_pending? 当节点需要重新引导时，返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Use the recipe_name method to return the name of a recipe.
trans-unit.target: 使用 recipe_name 方法返回一个配方名称。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_data_exists? method to find out if a Microsoft Windows registry key contains the specified data of the specified type under the value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 registry_data_exists? 找出Microsoft Windows注册表项是否在值下包含指定类型的指定数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_get_subkeys method to get a list of registry key values that are present for a Microsoft Windows registry key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 registry_get_subkeys 方法可获取Microsoft Windows注册表项中存在的注册表项值的列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_get_values method to get the registry key values (name, type, and data) for a Microsoft Windows registry key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 registry_get_values 方法获取Microsoft Windows注册表项的注册表项值（名称，类型和数据）。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_has_subkeys? method to find out if a Microsoft Windows registry key has one (or more) values.
trans-unit.target: 使用 registry_has_subkeys? 找出Microsoft Windows注册表项是否具有一个（或多个）值的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_key_exists? method to find out if a Microsoft Windows registry key exists at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 使用 registry_key_exists? 找出指定路径上是否存在Microsoft Windows注册表项的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_value_exists? method to find out if a registry key value exists. Use registry_data_exists? to test for the type and data of a registry key value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 registry_value_exists? 注册表项值是否存在的方法。使用 registry_data_exists? 测试注册表项值的类型和数据。

trans-unit.target: 在模板中使用 render 方法来引用部分模板文件：

trans-unit.source: Use the reregister argument to regenerate an RSA key pair for a user. The public key will be stored on the Chef server and the private key will be displayed on STDOUT or written to a named file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 reregister 参数为用户重新生成RSA密钥对。公钥将存储在Chef服务器上，私钥将显示在 STDOUT 上或写入命名文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the reregister argument to regenerate an RSA key pair for an API client. The public key will be stored on the Chef server and the private key will be displayed on STDOUT or written to a named file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 reregister 参数可以为API客户端重新生成RSA密钥对。公钥将存储在Chef服务器上，私钥将显示在 STDOUT 上或写入命名文件。

trans-unit.target: 使用 reset_property 方法清除属性值，就像从未设置过一样，然后使用默认值。例如，要清除名为 password 的属性的值：

trans-unit.target: 使用自定义资源顶部的 resource_name 方法为该资源声明​​一个自定义名称。例如：

trans-unit.source: Use the resources method to look up a resource in the resource collection. The resources method returns the value for the resource that it finds in the resource collection. The preferred syntax for the resources method is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 使用 resources 方法在资源集合中查找资源。该 resources 方法返回它找到的资源集合中的资源的价值。 resources 方法的首选语法如下：

trans-unit.source: Use the return keyword to stop processing a recipe based on a condition, but continue processing the chef-client run
trans-unit.target: 使用 return 关键字可根据条件停止处理配方，但继续处理Chef-Client运行

trans-unit.source: Use the run_list add argument to add run-list items (roles or recipes) to a node.
trans-unit.target: 使用 run_list add 参数可将运行列表项（角色或配方）添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the run_list remove argument to remove run-list items (roles or recipes) from a node. A recipe must be in one of the following formats: fully qualified, cookbook, or default. Both roles and recipes must be in quotes, for example: 'role[ROLE_NAME]' or 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME]'. Use a comma to separate roles and recipes when removing more than one, like this: 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME],COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME,role[ROLE_NAME]'.
trans-unit.target: 使用 run_list remove 参数可从节点中删除运行列表项（角色或配方）。配方必须采用以下格式之一：完全限定，食谱或默认格式。角色和配方都必须用引号引起来，例如： 'role[ROLE_NAME]' 或 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME]' 。删除多个角色和配方时，请用逗号分隔，例如： 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME],COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME,role[ROLE_NAME]' 。

trans-unit.source: Use the run_list set argument to set the run-list for a node. A recipe must be in one of the following formats: fully qualified, cookbook, or default. Both roles and recipes must be in quotes, for example: 'role[ROLE_NAME]' or 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME]'. Use a comma to separate roles and recipes when setting more than one, like this: 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME],COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME,role[ROLE_NAME]'.
trans-unit.target: 使用 run_list set 参数设置节点的运行列表。配方必须采用以下格式之一：完全限定，食谱或默认格式。角色和配方都必须用引号引起来，例如： 'role[ROLE_NAME]' 或 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME]' 。设置多个角色和配方时，请使用逗号分隔，例如： 'recipe[COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME],COOKBOOK::RECIPE_NAME,role[ROLE_NAME]' 。

trans-unit.source: Use the run_lock_timeout setting in the client.rb file to specify the amount of time (in seconds) to wait for the lock file associated with an in-progress chef-client run to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 使用client.rb文件中的 run_lock_timeout 设置可以指定等待与正在进行的厨师客户机运行关联的锁定文件被删除的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Use the sea:power re-creation step above first, to follow the difference in the vault permissions.
trans-unit.target: 首先使用上面的 sea:power 重新创建步骤，以遵循保管库权限中的差异。

trans-unit.source: Use the sea:power recreation step above first, to follow the difference in the vault permissions.
trans-unit.target: 首先使用上面的 sea:power 娱乐步骤，以了解Vault权限的不同。

trans-unit.source: Use the search argument to search for a cookbook at https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks. A search query is used to return a list of cookbooks at https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks and uses the same syntax as the knife search subcommand.
trans-unit.target: 使用 search 参数在https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks上搜索食谱。搜索查询用于返回https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks上的食谱列表，并使用与 knife search 子命令相同的语法。

trans-unit.source: Use the search method to perform a search query against the Chef server from within a recipe.
trans-unit.target: 使用 search 方法可以从配方中对Chef服务器执行搜索查询。

trans-unit.source: Use the share argument to add a cookbook to https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks. This action will require a user account and a certificate for https://supermarket.chef.io. By default, knife will use the user name and API key that is identified in the configuration file used during the upload; otherwise these values must be specified on the command line or in an alternate configuration file. If a cookbook already exists on https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks, then only an owner or maintainer of that cookbook can make updates.
trans-unit.target: 使用 share 参数将食谱添加到https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks。此操作将需要一个用户帐户和https://supermarket.chef.io的证书。默认情况下，S刀将使用在上传过程中使用的配置文件中标识的用户名和API密钥；否则，必须在命令行或备用配置文件中指定这些值。如果https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks上已经存在某个菜谱，则只有该菜谱的所有者或维护者可以进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to display information about a node.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数显示有关节点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to display information about the specified environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数显示有关指定环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to show the details of a user.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数显示用户的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to show the details of an API client.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数显示API客户端的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to view information about a cookbook on https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数可查看有关https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks上食谱的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to view information about a cookbook, parts of a cookbook (attributes, definitions, files, libraries, providers, recipes, resources, and templates), or a file that is associated with a cookbook (including attributes such as checksum or specificity).
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数可查看有关食谱，食谱部分（属性，定义，文件，库，提供程序，配方，资源和模板）或与食谱相关联的文件（包括诸如校验和或特异性）。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to view the contents of a data bag.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数查看数据袋的内容。

trans-unit.source: Use the show argument to view the details of a role.
trans-unit.target: 使用 show 参数查看角色的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the test argument to test a cookbook for syntax errors. This argument uses Ruby syntax checking to verify every file in a cookbook that ends in .rb and Embedded Ruby (ERB). This argument will respect chefignore files when determining which cookbooks to test for syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 使用 test 参数测试食谱是否存在语法错误。此参数使用Ruby语法检查来验证食谱中以.rb和嵌入式Ruby（ERB）结尾的每个文件。在确定要测试语法错误的菜谱时，此参数将尊重Chefignore文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the unshare argument to stop the sharing of a cookbook at https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks. Only the maintainer of a cookbook may perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 使用 unshare 参数停止在https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks上共享食谱。只有菜谱的维护者才能执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Use the upload argument to upload one or more cookbooks (and any files that are associated with those cookbooks) from a local repository to the Chef server. Only files that do not already exist on the Chef server will be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 使用 upload 参数将一个或多个食谱（以及与这些食谱相关联的任何文件）从本地存储库上载到Chef服务器。将仅上传Chef服务器上尚不存在的文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the user-create, user-delete, user-edit, user-list and user-show subcommands to manage users.
trans-unit.target: 使用 user-create ， user-delete ， user-edit ， user-list 和 user-show 子命令来管理用户。

trans-unit.source: Use the value_for_platform method in a recipe to select a value based on the node['platform'] and node['platform_version'] attributes. These values are detected by Ohai during every chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 在配方中使用 value_for_platform 方法可基于 node['platform'] 和 node['platform_version'] 属性选择一个值。Ohai在每次厨师客户运行期间都会检测到这些值。

trans-unit.source: Use the value_for_platform_family method in a recipe to select a value based on the node['platform_family'] attribute. This value is detected by Ohai during every chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 在配方中使用 value_for_platform_family 方法可基于 node['platform_family'] 属性选择一个值。Ohai在每次厨师客户运行期间都会检测到该值。

trans-unit.source: Use the wc command to get the character count of a large node object file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 wc 命令获取大型节点目标文件的字符数。例如：

trans-unit.source: Use the with_run_context method to define a block that has a pointer to a location in the run_context hierarchy. Resources in recipes always run at the root of the run_context hierarchy, whereas custom resources and notification blocks always build a child run_context which contains their sub-resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用 with_run_context 方法定义一个块，该块具有一个指向 run_context 层次结构中某个位置的指针。配方中的资源始终在 run_context 层次结构的根目录中运行，而自定义资源和通知块始终会构建一个包含其子资源的子级 run_context 。

trans-unit.source: Use the Create global permission to define which users and groups may create the following server object types: cookbooks, data bags, environments, nodes, roles, and tags. This permission is required for any user who uses the knife [object] create argument to interact with objects on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ 创建全局”权限来定义哪些用户和组可以创建以下服务器对象类型：食谱，数据包，环境，节点，角色和标签。使用 knife [object] create 参数与Chef服务器上的对象进行交互的任何用户都需要此权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the Delete permission to define which users and groups may delete an object. This permission is required for any user who uses the knife [object] delete [object_name] argument to interact with objects on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ 删除”权限来定义哪些用户和组可以删除对象。使用 knife [object] delete [object_name] 参数与Chef服务器上的对象进行交互的任何用户都需要此权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the Grant permission to define which users and groups may configure permissions on an object. This permission is required for any user who configures permissions using the Administration tab in the Chef management console.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ 授予”权限可以定义哪些用户和组可以配置对象的权限。使用Chef管理控制台中“ 管理”选项卡配置权限的任何用户都需要此权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the List global permission to define which users and groups may view the following server object types: cookbooks, data bags, environments, nodes, roles, and tags. This permission is required for any user who uses the knife [object] list argument to interact with objects on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ 列表”全局权限可以定义哪些用户和组可以查看以下服务器对象类型：食谱，数据包，环境，节点，角色和标签。使用 knife [object] list 参数与Chef服务器上的对象进行交互的任何用户都需要此权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the Read permission to define which users and groups may view the details of an object. This permission is required for any user who uses the knife [object] show [object_name] argument to interact with objects on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ 读取”权限可以定义哪些用户和组可以查看对象的详细信息。使用 knife [object] show [object_name] 参数与Chef服务器上的对象进行交互的任何用户都需要此权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the Update permission to define which users and groups may edit the details of an object. This permission is required for any user who uses the knife [object] edit [object_name] argument to interact with objects on the Chef server and for any chef-client to save node data to the Chef server at the conclusion of a chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ 更新”权限来定义哪些用户和组可以编辑对象的详细信息。对于使用 knife [object] edit [object_name] 参数与Chef服务器上的对象进行交互的任何用户，以及所有Chef-Client在Chef-client运行结束时将节点数据保存到Chef Server的用户，都需要此权限。。

trans-unit.source: Use the apt_package resource to manage packages for the Debian and Ubuntu platforms.
trans-unit.target: 使用apt_package资源来管理Debian和Ubuntu平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the apt_update resource to manage Apt repository updates on Debian and Ubuntu platforms.
trans-unit.target: 使用apt_update资源来管理Debian和Ubuntu平台上的Apt存储库更新。

trans-unit.source: Use the bash resource to execute scripts using the Bash interpreter. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用bash资源来使用Bash解释器执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（根据其性质）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the bash resource to install the package on the node, but only when the package is not already installed
trans-unit.target: 使用bash资源将软件包安装在节点上，但仅当尚未安装软件包时

trans-unit.source: Use the batch resource to execute a batch script using the cmd.exe interpreter. The batch resource creates and executes a temporary file (similar to how the script resource behaves), rather than running the command inline. This resource inherits actions (:run and :nothing) and properties (creates, cwd, environment, group, path, timeout, and user) from the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用批处理资源通过cmd.exe解释器执行批处理脚本。该批次的资源创建并执行一个临时文件（类似于如何脚本资源的行为），而不是运行命令行内。这种资源继承操作（ :run 和 :nothing ）和属性（ creates ， cwd ， environment ， group ， path ， timeout ，并且 user 从）执行资源。使用此资源执行的命令（根据其性质）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the bff_package resource to manage packages for the AIX platform using the installp utility. When a package is installed from a local file, it must be added to the node using the remote_file or cookbook_file resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用bff_package资源通过installp实用程序来管理AIX平台的软件包。从本地文件安装软件包时，必须使用remote_file或cookbook_file资源将其添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the breakpoint resource to add breakpoints to recipes. Run the chef-shell in chef-client mode, and then use those breakpoints to debug recipes. Breakpoints are ignored by the chef-client during an actual chef-client run. That said, breakpoints are typically used to debug recipes only when running them in a non-production environment, after which they are removed from those recipes before the parent cookbook is uploaded to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用断点资源将断点添加到配方中。在chef-client模式下运行chef-shell，然后使用这些断点来调试配方。厨师客户端在实际的厨师客户端运行期间将忽略断点。也就是说，断点通常仅在非生产环境中运行时才用于调试配方，然后在将父食谱上传到Chef服务器之前将其从那些配方中删除。

trans-unit.source: Use the chef_gem resource to install a gem only for the instance of Ruby that is dedicated to the chef-client. When a package is installed from a local file, it must be added to the node using the remote_file or cookbook_file resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用chef_gem资源仅为专用于chef-client的Ruby实例安装gem。从本地文件安装软件包时，必须使用remote_file或cookbook_file资源将其添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the chef_gem resource to install gems that are needed by the chef-client during the execution phase.
trans-unit.target: 使用chef_gem资源来安装chef-client在执行阶段所需的gem。

trans-unit.source: Use the chef_handler resource to enable handlers during a chef-client run. The resource allows arguments to be passed to the chef-client, which then applies the conditions defined by the custom handler to the node attribute data collected during the chef-client run, and then processes the handler based on that data.
trans-unit.target: 使用chef_handler资源在chef-client运行期间启用处理程序。该资源允许将参数传递给Chef-Client，后者将自定义处理程序定义的条件应用于在Chef-Client运行期间收集的节点属性数据，然后基于该数据处理处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the chocolatey_package resource to manage packages using Chocolatey for the Microsoft Windows platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用Chocolatey_package资源使用Microsoft Windows平台上的Chocolatey管理软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the cookbook_file resource to copy a file from a cookbook’s /files directory. Use the template resource to create a file based on a template in a cookbook’s /templates directory. And use the remote_file resource to transfer a file to a node from a remote location.
trans-unit.target: 使用cookbook_file资源从Cookbook的 /files 目录复制文件。使用模板资源可根据食谱的 /templates 目录中的模板创建文件。并使用remote_file资源将文件从远程位置传输到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the cookbook_file resource to transfer files from a sub-directory of COOKBOOK_NAME/files/ to a specified path located on a host that is running the chef-client. The file is selected according to file specificity, which allows different source files to be used based on the hostname, host platform (operating system, distro, or as appropriate), or platform version. Files that are located in the COOKBOOK_NAME/files/default sub-directory may be used on any platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用cookbook_file资源将文件从 COOKBOOK_NAME/files/ 的子目录传输到运行Chef-Client的主机上的指定路径。根据文件特定性选择文件，这允许根据主机名，主机平台（操作系统，发行版或适当的操作系统）或平台版本使用不同的源文件。位于 COOKBOOK_NAME/files/default 子目录中的文件可以在任何平台上使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the cron resource to manage cron entries for time-based job scheduling. Properties for a schedule will default to * if not provided. The cron resource requires access to a crontab program, typically cron.
trans-unit.target: 使用cron资源来管理cron条目以进行基于时间的作业调度。如果未提供，则日程表的属性将默认为 * 。该cron的资源需要访问一个crontab程序，通常的cron。

trans-unit.source: Use the csh resource to execute scripts using the csh interpreter. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用csh资源来使用csh解释器执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（根据其性质）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the deploy resource to manage and control deployments. This is a popular resource, but is also complex, having the most properties, multiple providers, the added complexity of callbacks, plus four attributes that support layout modifications from within a recipe.
trans-unit.target: 使用部署资源来管理和控制部署。这是一种流行的资源，但也很复杂，具有最多的属性，多个提供程序，增加的回调复杂性以及四个支持从配方内部修改布局的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the directory resource to create the /var/www/vhosts directory on the node:
trans-unit.target: 使用目录资源在节点上创建 /var/www/vhosts 目录：

trans-unit.source: Use the directory resource to manage a directory, which is a hierarchy of folders that comprises all of the information stored on a computer. The root directory is the top-level, under which the rest of the directory is organized. The directory resource uses the name property to specify the path to a location in a directory. Typically, permission to access that location in the directory is required.
trans-unit.target: 使用目录资源来管理目录，目录是文件夹的层次结构，其中包含计算机上存储的所有信息。根目录是顶级目录，在该目录下，其余目录被组织。该目录资源使用 name 属性来指定目录中的一个位置的路径。通常，需要具有访问目录中该位置的权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the dpkg_package resource to manage packages for the dpkg platform. When a package is installed from a local file, it must be added to the node using the remote_file or cookbook_file resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用dpkg_package资源来管理dpkg平台的软件包。从本地文件安装软件包时，必须使用remote_file或cookbook_file资源将其添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the easy_install_package resource to manage packages for the Python platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用easy_install_package资源来管理Python平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the env resource to manage environment keys in Microsoft Windows. After an environment key is set, Microsoft Windows must be restarted before the environment key will be available to the Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 使用env资源在Microsoft Windows中管理环境密钥。设置环境密钥后，必须重新启动Microsoft Windows，然后环境密钥才能用于任务计划程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the erl_call resource to connect to a node located within a distributed Erlang system. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用erl_call资源连接到位于分布式Erlang系统内的节点。使用此资源执行的命令（根据其性质）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the execute resource to execute a single command. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用execute资源执行单个命令。使用此资源执行的命令（根据其性质）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the execute resource to run a single command. Use multiple execute resource blocks to run multiple commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用执行资源来运行单个命令。使用多个执行资源块来运行多个命令。

trans-unit.source: Use the file resource to manage files directly on a node.
trans-unit.target: 使用文件资源直接在节点上管理文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the freebsd_package resource to manage packages for the FreeBSD platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用freebsd_package资源来管理FreeBSD平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the gem_package resource to manage gem packages that are only included in recipes. When a package is installed from a local file, it must be added to the node using the remote_file or cookbook_file resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用gem_package资源来管理仅包含在配方中的gem包。从本地文件安装软件包时，必须使用remote_file或cookbook_file资源将其添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the git resource to manage source control resources that exist in a git repository. git version 1.6.5 (or higher) is required to use all of the functionality in the git resource.
trans-unit.target: 使用git资源来管理git存储库中存在的源代码控制资源。必须使用git版本1.6.5（或更高版本）才能使用git资源中的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: Use the group resource to manage a local group.
trans-unit.target: 使用组资源来管理本地组。

trans-unit.source: Use the homebrew_package resource to manage packages for the Mac OS X platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用homebrew_package资源来管理Mac OS X平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the http_request resource to send an HTTP request (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, HEAD, or OPTIONS) with an arbitrary message. This resource is often useful when custom callbacks are necessary.
trans-unit.target: 使用http_request资源发送带有任意消息的HTTP请求（ GET ， PUT ， POST ， DELETE ， HEAD 或 OPTIONS ）。当需要自定义回调时，此资源通常很有用。

trans-unit.source: Use the ifconfig resource to manage interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 使用ifconfig资源来管理接口。

trans-unit.source: Use the ips_package resource to manage packages (using Image Packaging System (IPS)) on the Solaris 11 platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用ips_package资源在Solaris 11平台上管理软件包（使用映像打包系统（IPS））。

trans-unit.source: Use the ksh resource to execute scripts using the Korn shell (ksh) interpreter. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用ksh资源以使用Korn Shell（ksh）解释器执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（就其性质而言）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the launchd resource to manage system-wide services (daemons) and per-user services (agents) on the Mac OS X platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用启动的资源在Mac OS X平台上管理系统范围的服务（守护程序）和每用户服务（代理）。

trans-unit.source: Use the link resource to create symbolic or hard links.
trans-unit.target: 使用链接资源创建符号或硬链接。

trans-unit.source: Use the log resource to create log entries. The log resource behaves like any other resource: built into the resource collection during the compile phase, and then run during the execution phase. (To create a log entry that is not built into the resource collection, use Chef::Log instead of the log resource.)
trans-unit.target: 使用日志资源创建日志条目。该日志像任何其他资源的资源的行为：在编译阶段建成资源集合，然后在执行阶段运行。（要创建资源集合中未内置的日志条目，请使用 Chef::Log 而不是日志资源。）

trans-unit.source: Use the macports_package resource to manage packages for the Mac OS X platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用macports_package资源来管理Mac OS X平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the mdadm resource to manage RAID devices in a Linux environment using the mdadm utility. The mdadm provider will create and assemble an array, but it will not create the config file that is used to persist the array upon reboot. If the config file is required, it must be done by specifying a template with the correct array layout, and then by using the mount provider to create a file systems table (fstab) entry.
trans-unit.target: 使用mdadm资源通过mdadm实用程序在Linux环境中管理RAID设备。该mdadm的供应商将创建并组装一个数组，但它不会创建一个用于保存在重新启动的阵列配置文件。如果需要配置文件，则必须通过指定具有正确阵列布局的模板，然后使用安装提供程序创建文件系统表（fstab）条目来完成。

trans-unit.source: Use the mount resource to manage a mounted file system.
trans-unit.target: 使用安装资源来管理已安装的文件系统。

trans-unit.source: Use the ohai resource to reload the Ohai configuration on a node. This allows recipes that change system attributes (like a recipe that adds a user) to refer to those attributes later on during the chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 使用ohai资源在节点上重新加载Ohai配置。这允许更改系统属性的配方（例如添加用户的配方）稍后在厨师客户端运行期间引用这些属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the openbsd_package resource to manage packages for the OpenBSD platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用openbsd_package资源来管理OpenBSD平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the osx_profile resource to manage configuration profiles (.mobileconfig files) on the Mac OS X platform. The osx_profile resource installs profiles by using the uuidgen library to generate a unique ProfileUUID, and then using the profiles command to install the profile on the system.
trans-unit.target: 使用osx_profile资源在Mac OS X平台上管理配置文件（ .mobileconfig 文件）。该osx_profile资源使用安装配置文件 uuidgen 库生成唯一 ProfileUUID ，然后使用 profiles 命令安装在系统上的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the package resource to manage packages. When the package is installed from a local file (such as with RubyGems, dpkg, or RPM Package Manager), the file must be added to the node using the remote_file or cookbook_file resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用软件包资源来管理软件包。当从本地文件（例如RubyGems，dpkg或RPM软件包管理器）安装软件包时，必须使用remote_file或cookbook_file资源将文件添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the package, template (two times), directory, and service resources to define the website resource. Remember: order matters !
trans-unit.target: 使用package，template（两次），directory和service资源来定义 website 资源。记住：顺序很重要！

trans-unit.source: Use the pacman_package resource to manage packages (using pacman) on the Arch Linux platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用pacman_package资源在Arch Linux平台上管理软件包（使用pacman）。

trans-unit.source: Use the paludis_package resource to manage packages for the Paludis platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用paludis_package资源来管理Paludis平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the perl resource to execute scripts using the Perl interpreter. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用perl资源以使用Perl解释器执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（就其性质而言）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the portage_package resource to manage packages for the Gentoo platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用portage_package资源来管理Gentoo平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the powershell_script resource to execute a script using the Windows PowerShell interpreter, much like how the script and script-based resources—bash, csh, perl, python, and ruby—are used. The powershell_script is specific to the Microsoft Windows platform and the Windows PowerShell interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 使用powershell_script资源使用Windows PowerShell解释器执行脚本，就像使用脚本和基于脚本的资源bash，csh，perl，python和ruby一样。该powershell_script是特定于Microsoft Windows平台和Windows PowerShell的解释。

trans-unit.source: Use the python resource to execute scripts using the Python interpreter. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用python资源来使用Python解释器执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（就其性质而言）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the reboot resource to reboot a node, a necessary step with some installations on certain platforms. This resource is supported for use on the Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux platforms.
trans-unit.target: 使用重新启动资源重新启动节点，这是某些平台上某些安装的必要步骤。支持在Microsoft Windows，Mac OS X和Linux平台上使用此资源。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry_key resource to create and delete registry keys in Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 使用registry_key资源在Microsoft Windows中创建和删除注册表项。

trans-unit.source: Use the remote_directory resource to incrementally transfer a directory from a cookbook to a node. The directory that is copied from the cookbook should be located under COOKBOOK_NAME/files/default/REMOTE_DIRECTORY. The remote_directory resource will obey file specificity.
trans-unit.target: 使用remote_directory资源将目录从菜谱增量传输到节点。从食谱复制的目录应该位于 COOKBOOK_NAME/files/default/REMOTE_DIRECTORY 下。该remote_directory资源将遵守文件特异性。

trans-unit.source: Use the remote_file resource to transfer a file from a remote location using file specificity. This resource is similar to the file resource.
trans-unit.target: 使用remote_file资源使用文件专用性从远程位置传输文件。此资源类似于文件资源。

trans-unit.source: Use the route resource to manage the system routing table in a Linux environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用路由资源来管理Linux环境中的系统路由表。

trans-unit.source: Use the rpm_package resource to manage packages for the RPM Package Manager platform.
trans-unit.target: 使用rpm_package资源来管理RPM软件包管理器平台的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use the ruby resource to execute scripts using the Ruby interpreter. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用ruby资源使用Ruby解释器执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（就其性质而言）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

trans-unit.source: Use the ruby_block resource to execute Ruby code during a chef-client run. Ruby code in the ruby_block resource is evaluated with other resources during convergence, whereas Ruby code outside of a ruby_block resource is evaluated before other resources, as the recipe is compiled.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef-Client运行期间，使用ruby_block资源执行Ruby代码。在收敛过程中， ruby_block 资源中的Ruby代码将与其他资源一起评估，而 ruby_block 资源之外的Ruby代码将在其他资源之前进行评估，因为配方已被编译。

trans-unit.source: Use the script resource to execute a script using a specific interpreter (Ruby, Python, Perl, csh, or Bash).
trans-unit.target: 使用脚本资源使用特定的解释器（Ruby，Python，Perl，csh或Bash）执行脚本。

trans-unit.source: Use the script resource to execute scripts using a specified interpreter, such as Bash, csh, Perl, Python, or Ruby. This resource may also use any of the actions and properties that are available to the execute resource. Commands that are executed with this resource are (by their nature) not idempotent, as they are typically unique to the environment in which they are run. Use not_if and only_if to guard this resource for idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 使用脚本资源使用指定的解释器（例如Bash，csh，Perl，Python或Ruby）执行脚本。该资源还可以使用执行资源可用的任何操作和属性。使用此资源执行的命令（就其性质而言）不是幂等的，因为它们通常对于运行它们的环境是唯一的。使用 not_if 和 only_if 可以保护该资源的幂等性。

A string or ID that identifies the group owner by group name, including fully qualified group names such as domain\group or group@domain. If this value is not specified, existing groups remain unchanged and new group assignments use the default POSIX group (if available).
trans-unit.target: 用于配置目录权限。通过组名标识组所有者的字符串或ID，包括完全限定的组名，例如 domain\group 或 group@domain 。如果未指定此值，则现有组保持不变，并且新的组分配使用默认的 POSIX 组（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Use to configure permissions for directories. A string or ID that identifies the group owner by user name, including fully qualified user names such as domain\user or user@domain. If this value is not specified, existing owners remain unchanged and new owner assignments use the current user (when necessary).
trans-unit.target: 用于配置目录权限。通过用户名标识组所有者的字符串或ID，包括完全限定的用户名，例如 domain\user 或 user@domain 。如果未指定此值，则现有所有者将保持不变，并且新的所有者分配将使用当前用户（必要时）。

trans-unit.source: Use to return the ~ path in Linux and Mac OS X or the %HOMEPATH% in Microsoft Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use to set the IP version: "ipv4" or "ipv6". When set to "ipv6", the API listens on IPv6 and front end and back end services communicate via IPv6 when a high availability configuration is used. When configuring for IPv6 in a high availability configuration, be sure to set the netmask on the IPv6 backend_vip attribute. Default value: "ipv4".
trans-unit.target: 用于设置IP版本： "ipv4" 或 "ipv6" 。设置为 "ipv6" ，API将侦听IPv6，并且在使用高可用性配置时，前端和后端服务会通过IPv6进行通信。在高可用性配置中配置IPv6时，请确保在IPv6 backend_vip 属性上设置网络掩码。默认值： "ipv4" 。

trans-unit.source: Use to specify a group or user name. This is identical to what is entered in the login box for Microsoft Windows, such as user_name, domain\user_name, or user_name@fully_qualified_domain_name. The chef-client does not need to know if a principal is a user or a group.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定组或用户名。这与在Microsoft Windows的登录框中输入的内容相同，例如 user_name ， domain\user_name 或 user_name@fully_qualified_domain_name 。厨师客户不需要知道委托人是用户还是组。

trans-unit.source: Use to specify that search results only return objects to which an actor (user, client, etc.) has read access, as determined by ACL settings. This affects all searches. When true, the performance of the Chef management console may increase because it enables the Chef management console to skip redundant ACL checks. To ensure the Chef management console is configured properly, after this setting has been applied with a chef-server-ctl reconfigure run chef-manage-ctl reconfigure to ensure the Chef management console also picks up the setting. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定搜索结果仅返回参与者（用户，客户端等）具有读取访问权限的对象（由ACL设置确定）。这会影响所有搜索。设置为 true 时，Chef管理控制台的性能可能会提高，因为它使Chef管理控制台可以跳过冗余的ACL检查。为了确保Chef管理控制台的配置正确，在使用 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 应用此设置后，运行 chef-manage-ctl reconfigure 以确保Chef管理控制台也可以使用该设置。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: Using a Ruby expression is the most common approach for defining template variables because this is how all variables that are sent to a template are referenced. Whenever a template needs to use an each, if, or end, use a Ruby statement.
trans-unit.target: 使用Ruby表达式是定义模板变量的最常用方法，因为这是引用发送到模板的所有变量的方式。每当模板需要使用 each ， if 或 end 时，请使用Ruby语句。

trans-unit.source: Using a branch tracking strategy requires that a branch for each environment exists in the source control and that each cookbook’s versioning policy is tracked at the branch level. This approach is relatively simple and lightweight: for development environments that track the latest cookbooks, just bump the version before a cookbook is uploaded for testing. For any cookbooks that require higher levels of version control, knife allows cookbooks to be uploaded to specific environments and for cookbooks to be frozen (which prevents others from being able to make changes to that cookbook).
trans-unit.target: 使用分支跟踪策略需要在源代码管理中为每个环境存在一个分支，并在分支级别跟踪每个食谱的版本控制策略。这种方法相对简单，轻巧：对于跟踪最新食谱的开发环境，只需在上传食谱进行测试之前修改版本即可。对于需要更高版本控制的任何菜谱，刀允许将菜谱上载到特定环境，并冻结菜谱（这会阻止其他人对菜谱进行更改）。

trans-unit.source: Using a maximum version control strategy is required when everything needs to be tracked in source control. This approach is very similar to a branch tracking strategy while the cookbook is in development and being tested, but is more complicated and time-consuming (and requires file-level editing for environment data) in order to get the cookbook deployed to a production environment.
trans-unit.target: 当一切都需要在源码控制中进行跟踪时,就需要使用最大版本控制策略。这种方法与cookbook在开发和测试时的分支跟踪策略非常相似,但为了让cookbook部署到生产环境中,这种方法更加复杂和耗时(并且需要对环境数据进行文件级编辑)。

For example, if EditPad Pro is the text editor of choice and is located at the following path:

trans-unit.source: When a cookbook is uploaded, only files that are new or updated will be included. This approach minimizes the amount of storage and time that is required during the modify-upload-test cycle. To keep track of which files have already been uploaded, the chef-client uses a checksum and assigns a checksum to each file. These checksums are used in the cookbook version manifest, alongside the same records that store the file description (name, specificity, and so on), as well as the checksum and the URL from which the file’s contents can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 上载食谱时，将仅包括新的或更新的文件。这种方法最大程度地减少了修改-上传-测试周期所需的存储量和时间。为了跟踪哪些文件已经上传，厨师客户端使用校验和并将校验和分配给每个文件。这些校验和与食谱版本清单一起使用，与存储文件描述（名称，特异性等）的相同记录以及校验和和可从中检索文件内容的URL一起使用。

trans-unit.source: When a template is rendered, Ruby expressions and statements are evaluated by the chef-client. The variables listed in the template resource’s variables parameter and in the node object are evaluated. The chef-client then passes these variables to the template, where they will be accessible as instance variables within the template. The node object can be accessed just as if it were part of a recipe, using the same syntax.

For example, when the chef-client is run as a non-root user that is unable to create or modify users, the user resource will not work.

trans-unit.source: When these settings are used, any attribute not defined in a whitelist will not be saved. Each attribute type is whitelisted independently of the other attribute types. For example, if automatic_attribute_whitelist defines attributes to be saved, but normal_attribute_whitelist, default_attribute_whitelist, and override_attribute_whitelist are not defined, then all normal, default and override attributes are saved, along with only the specified automatic attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些设置时，将不会保存白名单中未定义的任何属性。每个属性类型都独立于其他属性类型列入白名单。例如，如果 automatic_attribute_whitelist 定义了要保存的属性，但 normal_attribute_whitelist ， default_attribute_whitelist 和 override_attribute_whitelist ，则将保存所有常规，默认和替代属性以及仅指定的自动属性。

trans-unit.source: When this approach is used, the client.rb file must also tell the chef-client how to install and run the handler. There is no default install location for handlers. The simplest way to distribute and install them is via RubyGems, though other methods such as GitHub or HTTP will also work. Once the handler is installed on the system, enable it in the client.rb file by requiring it. After the handler is installed, it may require additional configuration. This will vary from handler to handler. If a handler is a very simple handler, it may only require the creation of a new instance. For example, if a handler named MyOrg::EmailMe is hardcoded for all of the values required to send email, a new instance is required. And then the custom handler must be associated with each of the handler types for which it will run.
trans-unit.target: 使用这种方法时，client.rb文件还必须告诉Chef-client如何安装和运行处理程序。处理程序没有默认的安装位置。分发和安装它们的最简单方法是通过RubyGems，尽管其他方法（例如GitHub或HTTP）也可以使用。将处理程序安装在系统上后，通过要求在client.rb文件中启用它。安装处理程序后，可能需要其他配置。随处理程序的不同而不同。如果处理程序是非常简单的处理程序，则可能只需要创建一个新实例即可。例如，如果一个名为 MyOrg::EmailMe 的处理程序是为发送电子邮件所需的所有值进行硬编码的，因此需要一个新实例。然后，自定义处理程序必须与将为其运行的每种处理程序类型相关联。

trans-unit.source: When this command is run, the certificate files (*.crt and/or *.pem) that are located in the /.chef/trusted_certs directory are checked to see if they have valid X.509 certificate properties. A warning is returned when certificates do not have valid X.509 certificate properties or if the /.chef/trusted_certs directory does not contain any certificates.

trans-unit.source: When using an explicit gem_binary, options must be passed as a string. When not using an explicit gem_binary, the chef-client is forced to spawn a gems process to install the gems (which uses more system resources) when options are passed as a string. String options are passed verbatim to the gems command and should be specified just as if they were passed on a command line. For example, --prerelease for a pre-release gem.
trans-unit.target: 使用显式 gem_binary 时，必须将选项作为字符串传递。当不使用显式的 gem_binary 时，当以字符串形式传递选项时，厨师客户端将被强制生成一个gems进程来安装gem（使用更多的系统资源）。字符串选项按原样传递给gems命令，并且应该像在命令行上传递一样指定它们。例如，-- --prerelease 用于预发布的gem。

trans-unit.source: When using the deploy_revision provider, and when the deploy fails for any reason, and when the same code is used to re-deploy, the action should be set manually to :force_deploy. Forcing the re-deploy will remove the old release directory, after which the deploy can proceed as usual. (Forcing a re-deploy over the current release can cause some downtime.) Deployed revisions are stored in (file_cache_path)/revision-deploys/(deploy_path).
trans-unit.target: 当使用 deploy_revision 提供程序时，由于某种原因导致部署失败，并且使用相同的代码重新部署时，应将操作手动设置为 :force_deploy 。强制重新部署将删除旧的发行目录，此后部署可以照常进行。（强行对当前版本进行重新部署可能会导致一些停机。）部署的修订存储在 (file_cache_path)/revision-deploys/(deploy_path) 。

trans-unit.source: When verification of a remote server’s SSL certificate is disabled, the chef-client will issue a warning similar to “SSL validation of HTTPS requests is disabled. HTTPS connections are still encrypted, but the chef-client is not able to detect forged replies or man-in-the-middle attacks.” To configure SSL for the chef-client, set ssl_verify_mode to :verify_peer (recommended) orverify_api_cert to true in the client.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 禁用远程服务器的SSL证书验证后，厨师客户端将发出类似于“禁用HTTPS请求的SSL验证”的警告。HTTPS连接仍处于加密状态，但是厨师客户端无法检测到伪造的回复或中间人攻击。” 配置SSL的厨师客户端，集 ssl_verify_mode 到 :verify_peer （推荐）或 verify_api_cert 到 true 的client.rb文件。

trans-unit.source: When why-run mode is enabled, a chef-client run will occur that does everything up to the point at which configuration would normally occur. This includes getting the configuration data, authenticating to the Chef server, rebuilding the node object, expanding the run-list, getting the necessary cookbook files, resetting node attributes, identifying the resources, and building the resource collection and does not include mapping each resource to a provider or configuring any part of the system.
trans-unit.target: 当启用why-run模式时,将发生一个chef-client运行,它将做所有的事情,直到通常会发生配置的点。这包括获取配置数据、认证到Chef服务器、重建节点对象、扩展运行列表、获取必要的cookbook文件、重置节点属性、识别资源和构建资源集合,不包括将每个资源映射到提供者或配置系统的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: While Chef includes tooling like the Chef development kit, encourages integration and unit testing, and defines workflow around cookbook authoring and policy, it’s important to note that you know best about how your infrastructure should be put together. Therefore, Chef makes as few decisions on its own as possible. When a decision must be made, the chef-client uses a reasonable default setting that can be easily changed. While Chef encourages the use of the tooling packaged in the Chef development kit, none of these tools should be seen as a requirement or pre-requisite for being successful using Chef.
trans-unit.target: Chef提供了诸如Chef开发工具包之类的工具，鼓励集成和单元测试，并围绕菜谱创作和策略定义工作流，但重要的是要注意您最了解应如何组合基础结构。因此，Chef只能自己做出尽可能少的决定。当必须做出决定时，厨师客户将使用可以轻松更改的合理默认设置。尽管Chef鼓励使用Chef开发工具包中的工具，但是这些工具都不应该被视为成功使用Chef的必要条件。

trans-unit.source: While synthetic benchmarks should be taken with a grain of salt, as they don’t typically represent real-world performance, internal synthetic benchmarks at Chef have seen a standalone Chef server installed on a c3.2xlarge Amazon Web Services (AWS) instance handle more than 1,000 CCRs/min (30k nodes).
trans-unit.target: 虽然综合基准测试应该花一点时间，因为它们通常不代表真实世界的性能，但是Chef的内部综合基准测试发现，在 c3.2xlarge Amazon Web Services（AWS）实例上安装的独立Chef服务器可以处理更多工作超过1,000个CCR /分钟（3万个节点）。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard patterns must be escaped (using a backslash) so that the wildcard itself can reach the Chef server. If they are not escaped, the wildcard is expanded into the actual filenames and knife will not know the wildcard was intended to be used. For example, if the Chef server has data bags named aardvarks, anagrams, and arp_tables, but the local file system only has aardvarks and anagrams, escaping vs. not escaping the wildcard pattern will yield different results:
trans-unit.target: 必须对通配符模式进行转义（使用反斜杠），以便通配符本身可以到达Chef服务器。如果不对它们进行转义，则通配符将扩展为实际的文件名，而knife将不知道该通配符是打算使用的。例如，如果厨师服务器的数据包命名为 aardvarks ， anagrams ，和 arp_tables ，但本地文件系统只有 aardvarks 和 anagrams ，逃避与不逃避通配符模式将产生不同的结果：

trans-unit.source: With the :create action, a user’s home directory is created based on HOME_DIR. If the home directory is missing, it is created unless CREATE_HOME in /etc/login.defs is set to no. When created, a skeleton set of files and sub-directories is also created in the home directory.

trans-unit.source: With the :modify action, a user’s home directory is moved to HOME_DIR. If the home directory is missing, it is created unless CREATE_HOME in /etc/login.defs is set to no. The contents of the user’s home directory are moved to the new location.
trans-unit.target: 通过 :modify 动作，用户的主目录被移动到 HOME_DIR 。如果主目录丢失，除非它被创建 CREATE_HOME 在 /etc/login.defs 中设置为 no 。用户主目录的内容将移动到新位置。

trans-unit.source: after-sb-0pri: A split-brain event has been detected and neither node is the primary node. The discard-younger-primary action will roll back any changes made on the last host that was the primary node.
trans-unit.target: after-sb-0pri：已检测到 split-brain 事件，并且两个节点都不是主节点。该 discard-younger-primary 行动将回滚最后一个主机，这是在主节点上所做的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: after-sb-1pri: A split-brain event has been detected and only one node believes that it was the primary node when the event happened. The discard-secondary action will continue operations on the primary node and will assume that the secondary node was lost.
trans-unit.target: after-sb-1pri：检测到 split-brain 事件，只有一个节点认为该事件发生时是主要节点。该 discard-secondary 行动将继续在主节点上操作，并假设辅助节点丢失。

trans-unit.source: after-sb-2pri: A split-brain event has been detected and both nodes believed they were primary nodes. The call-pri-lost-after-sb action will attempt to apply the discard-younger-primary from the 0pri configuration to determine which host should be the primary node. Once determined, the other host takes action to become the secondary node.
trans-unit.target: after-sb-2pri：已检测到 split-brain 事件，并且两个节点都认为它们是主要节点。该 call-pri-lost-after-sb 操作将尝试以应用 discard-younger-primary 从 0pri 配置，以确定哪些主机应该是主节点。一旦确定，其他主机将采取行动以成为辅助节点。

trans-unit.source: chef-shell acts as a chef-client. During startup, it reads the chef-client configuration file and contacts the Chef server to get attributes and cookbooks. The run-list will be set in the same way as normal chef-client runs. chef-client mode is activated with the -z or --client options. You can also specify the configuration file with -c CONFIG and the server URL with -S SERVER_URL.
trans-unit.target: Chef-shell充当厨师客户。在启动过程中，它将读取Chef-client配置文件并联系Chef服务器以获取属性和食谱。运行列表的设置方式与普通Chef-Client运行方式相同。 Chef --client 模式通过 -z 或--client选项激活。您还可以使用 -c CONFIG 指定配置文件，并使用 -S SERVER_URL 指定服务器URL 。

trans-unit.source: chef-shell acts as a chef-solo client. It attempts to load the chef-solo configuration file and JSON attributes. If the JSON attributes set a run-list, it will be honored. Cookbooks will be loaded in the same way that chef-solo loads them. chef-solo mode is activated with the -s or --solo command line option, and JSON attributes are specified in the same way as for chef-solo, with -j /path/to/chef-solo.json.
trans-unit.target: Chef-shell充当Chef-solo客户。它尝试加载chef-solo配置文件和JSON属性。如果JSON属性设置了运行列表，它将被接受。菜谱的加载方式与Chef-solo加载它们的方式相同。通过 -s 或 --solo 命令行选项激活Chef-solo模式，并通过 -j /path/to/chef-solo.json 与chef-solo相同地指定JSON属性。

trans-unit.source: chef-shell allows the current position in a run-list to be manipulated during a chef-client run. Add breakpoints to a recipe to take advantage of this functionality.
trans-unit.target: chef-shell允许在chef-client运行过程中对运行列表中的当前位置进行操作。在配方中添加断点来利用这个功能。

trans-unit.source: chef-shell can also switch to the same context as attribute files. Set an attribute with the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: chef-shell也可以切换到与属性文件相同的上下文。用下面的语法设置一个属性。

trans-unit.target: chef-shell可以用来调试现有的配方。首先需要将配方添加到节点的运行列表中,这样当启动 chef-shell 时,它就会被缓存,然后用于调试。chef-shell 会在启动时报告哪些配方被缓存。

trans-unit.source: chef-shell is a recipe debugging tool that allows the use of breakpoints within recipes. chef-shell runs as an Interactive Ruby (IRb) session. chef-shell supports both recipe and attribute file syntax, as well as interactive debugging features.
trans-unit.target: chef-shell是一个配方调试工具,允许在配方中使用断点。chef-shell以交互式Ruby(IRb)会话的方式运行。

trans-unit.source: chef-shell is the new name for Shef as of chef-client version 11.0. chef-shell is backwards compatible and aside from the name change, has the same set of functionality as with previous releases.
trans-unit.target: chef-shell是Shef在11.0版本中的新名称。chef-shell是向后兼容的,除了名称上的改变,其功能与之前的版本相同。

trans-unit.source: chef-solo (executable)
trans-unit.target: 厨师长

trans-unit.source: chef-solo can be run as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: chef-solo可以作为守护进程运行。

trans-unit.source: chef-solo can be used to manage node data using the command line and JSON files. Each JSON file contains a hash, the elements of which are added as node attributes. In addition, the run_list setting allows roles and/or recipes to be added to the node.
trans-unit.target: Chef-solo可用于使用命令行和JSON文件管理节点数据。每个JSON文件包含一个哈希，哈希的元素作为节点属性添加。另外， run_list 设置允许将角色和/或配方添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: chef-solo does not interact with the Chef server. Consequently, node-specific attributes must be located in a JSON file on the target system, a remote location (such as Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)), or a web server on the local network.
trans-unit.target: chef-solo不与Chef服务器交互。因此,节点的特定属性必须位于目标系统上的JSON文件、远程位置(如Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3))或本地网络上的Web服务器中。

trans-unit.source: chef-solo is an open source version of the chef-client that allows using cookbooks with nodes without requiring access to a Chef server. chef-solo uses Chef local mode, and does not support the following:
trans-unit.target: Chef-solo是Chef-client的开放源代码版本，它允许使用带有节点的食谱，而无需访问Chef服务器。Chef-solo使用Chef本地模式，并且不支持以下内容：

trans-unit.target: chef-solo支持两个地点,可以在这两个地点运行烹饪书。

trans-unit.source: chef-solo will look in the solo.rb file to determine the directory in which cookbooks are located.

trans-unit.source: chef-zero
trans-unit.target: chef-zero

trans-unit.source: chef-zero is a very lightweight Chef server that runs in-memory on the local machine. This allows the chef-client to be run against the chef-repo as if it were running against the Chef server. chef-zero was originally a standalone tool; it is enabled from within the chef-client by using the --local-mode option. chef-zero is very useful for quickly testing and validating the behavior of the chef-client, cookbooks, recipes, and run-lists before uploading that data to the actual Chef server.
trans-unit.target: Chef-zero是一个非常轻量的Chef服务器，它在本地计算机上的内存中运行。这允许在chef-repo上运行chef-client，就像在chef服务器上运行一样。零厨师最初是一个独立的工具；使用 --local-mode 选项可在Chef客户端中启用它。 Chef-zero对于在将数据上传到实际Chef服务器之前快速测试和验证Chef-Client，菜谱，食谱和运行列表的行为非常有用。

trans-unit.source: knife comes with a collection of built in subcommands that work together to provide all of the functionality required to take specific actions against any object in an organization, including cookbooks, nodes, roles, data bags, environments, and users. A knife plugin extends the functionality beyond built-in subcommands.
trans-unit.target: knife带有一组内置的子命令,这些子命令一起工作,提供了对组织中的任何对象采取特定行动所需的所有功能,包括食谱、节点、角色、数据袋、环境和用户。小刀插件扩展了内置子命令以外的功能。

trans-unit.source: knife includes a set of subcommands that are built around common verbs: delete, deps, diff, download, edit, list, show, upload, xargs. These subcommands allow knife to issue commands that interact with any object stored in the chef-repo or stored on the Chef server. Some important principles behind this group of subcommands includes:
trans-unit.target: knife包含一组围绕常用动词构建的子命令： delete ， deps ， diff ， download ， edit ， list ， show ， upload ， xargs 。这些子命令允许刀发出与存储在Chef-repo中或存储在Chef服务器中的任何对象进行交互的命令。这组子命令背后的一些重要原则包括：

trans-unit.source: knife includes the following subcommands:

trans-unit.source: knife is a command-line tool that provides an interface between a local chef-repo and the Chef server. knife helps users to manage:
trans-unit.target: knife是一个命令行工具,它提供了一个本地chef-repo和Chef服务器之间的接口,knife帮助用户管理。

trans-unit.source: knife is used to upload data to the Chef server from the chef-repo. Once uploaded, that data is used by the chef-client to manage all of the nodes that are registered with the Chef server and to ensure that the correct cookbooks, environments, roles, and other settings are applied to nodes correctly.
trans-unit.target: knife用来从chef-repo上传数据到Chef服务器。一旦上传,这些数据就会被厨师客户端用来管理所有在Chef服务器上注册的节点,并确保正确的cookbook、环境、角色和其他设置被正确应用到节点上。

trans-unit.source: knife runs from a management workstation and sits in-between a Chef server and an organization’s infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 刀具从管理工作站运行，位于Chef服务器和组织的基础结构之间。

trans-unit.source: knife runs from a management workstation and sits in-between a Chef server and an organization’s infrastructure. knife interacts with a Chef server by using the same REST API that is used by a chef-client. Role-based authentication controls (RBAC) can be used to authorize changes when knife is run with the Chef server. knife is configured during workstation setup, but subsequent modifications can be made using the knife.rb configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 刀具从管理工作站运行，位于Chef服务器和组织的基础结构之间。刀通过使用厨师客户端使用的相同REST API与Chef服务器进行交互。在Chef服务器上运行knife时，可以使用基于角色的身份验证控件（RBAC）来授权更改。在工作站安装过程中配置了knife，但是可以使用knife.rb配置文件进行后续修改。
